attributes.review: Don’t get this app. Actually do but then go leave a bad rating. Anyways It constantly kicks me out and it’s just not a great app overall. Honestly it just shouldn’t be on the App Store or available to the public. Therefore, this app should be banned.😌🧚🏾✨

attributes.title: Cancel trump

attributes.review:
By far the WORST app on the App Store. I just wanted to pay my respects for him losing the 2020 election but the app broke my microwave instead. When I opened the app it even told me to cut off my hand and mail it to him. Will be downloading Joe
Biden’s app now. 
Over all, ✨🧚🏻Very Disappointed✨🧚🏻
